title: Skillsmark strapline font?
content:
Anyone know what font the ’Recognised...’ font is set in?

Thought it was Foundry Journal, but its not.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Skillsmark.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203129/http:/typophile.com/files/Skillsmark_0.png) | 24.67 KB |

 [‹ 'heard' - serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203129/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49728 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans Serif extreme bold font ID needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203129/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49825 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marc

comments.content: … nor [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203129/http:/www.typography.net/type/bliss), even though “Skillsmark” appears to be, sort of.
